name: Savage Princess
overview: Savage Princess! The name strikes fear into the heart of even the bravest knight! Take the role of Princess Ava as she rescues herself from her kidnappers! Explore the castle, solve puzzles, and kill your enemies in this game for the ZX Spectrum; brought to you by the creator of "In the Walls of Eryx" and "The Wicker Woman", this game is sure to warm your retrogaming cockles.
